backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the AZAD NEXUS backend, handling user profile storage with role-based access control and a rice export inquiry submission/retrieval system with admin-only read access.
feature_evidence.json: A feature evidence report mapping implemented features (multi-page React frontend, corporate design theme, Home page sections) to their corresponding source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON snippet providing a one-line summary of the FeaturedProductsSlider component, noting its scroll button behavior and Tailwind lint fix.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for the light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the AZAD NEXUS React SPA, including SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, Google Fonts (Playfair Display and Inter), and the root div mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router configuration with routes for Home, Products, Quality Assurance, Global Footprint, Contact, and Admin pages, wrapped in a shared Layout with Navigation and Footer.
frontend/src/components/CertificationBad: A reusable card component that displays a certification with an icon, name, subtitle, description, and optional italicized note, styled with royal blue and gold accents.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedProducts: A horizontally scrollable slider showing the first four products from the products data, with desktop-only left/right scroll buttons and individual product cards linking to the Products page.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site-wide footer component displaying the AZAD NEXUS logo, a brand tagline, quick navigation links, contact details, and a bottom bar with certifications and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/InquiriesTable.t: Renders a sortable table of rice export inquiries with columns for ID, name, company, country, rice variety, quantity, message, and submission timestamp. Supports ascending/descending sort on any column via clickable headers.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, desktop nav links, a 'Request a Quote' CTA button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu. Active route is highlighted in gold.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single rice product card with a royal-blue header showing the product name and optional badge, plus a specs table listing grain length, moisture content, and purity.
frontend/src/components/RegionCard.tsx: Card component for displaying an export region with an icon, region name, covered countries, description, and a highlight badge.
Simple card component showing an icon, title, and description for a 'Why Choose Us' feature highlight with hover shadow effect.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product and ProductSpec TypeScript interfaces and exports a static array of six rice products (basmati and non-basmati) with specs and optional badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting and fetching inquiries, retrieving the caller's user profile, and checking admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines AZAD NEXUS brand CSS custom properties (royal blue and gold palette) for light/dark modes, and adds utility classes for typography and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page that handles Internet Identity authentication, verifies admin privileges, and displays an inquiries table with login/access-denied/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact/quote request page with a validated form for submitting rice purchase inquiries, including fields for name, company, country, rice variety, quantity, and message.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalFootprint.tsx: Static page showcasing AZAD NEXUS export markets across four regions (Middle East, Europe, Southeast Asia, Africa) with stats and region cards.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage featuring a hero section with CTAs, a featured products slider, and a 'Why Choose Us' section highlighting the company's rice export offerings.
frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx: Products page displaying Basmati and Non-Basmati rice variants in a tabbed layout using ProductCard components, with a styled page header and a CTA section linking to the contact page.
frontend/src/pages/QualityAssurance.tsx: Quality Assurance page detailing lab testing steps, packaging features, and certifications for AZAD NEXUS rice exports, with a styled header and CTA linking to the contact page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining brand color tokens (royal blue, gold, cream), custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), box shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes for the AZAD NEXUS site.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 3) describing the AZAD NEXUS B2B rice export website's architecture, design palette, implemented features, image requirements, and known issues.
